PAL.NAME: Microsoft OCS 2007 R2 - Edge
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2 Edge Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Auth - 00 - Requests - 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Auth - 00 - Requests\- 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of bad requests received/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Auth - 00 - Requests\- 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Auth - 00 - Requests\- 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 20 bad requests per second have been received
More than 30 bad requests per second have been received

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Auth - 00 - Requests\- 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Auth - 00 - Requests\- 003 - Bad Requests Received/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters - 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of failed attempts to authenticate with the relay over UDP.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10 failed attempts per-second to authenticate with the relay over UDP have been received
More than 20 failed attempts per-second to authenticate with the relay over UDP have been received

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters - 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of allocate requests over UDP that exceeded the port limit.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10 requests per-second over UDP that exceeded the port limit have been received
More than 20 requests per-second over UDP that exceeded the port limit have been received

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters - 021 - Packets Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 021 - Packets Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of packets over UDP dropped by the relay.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 021 - Packets Dropped/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 021 - Packets Dropped/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 300 packets over UDP dropped by the relay per-second
More than 300 packets over UDP dropped by the relay per-second

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 021 - Packets Dropped/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 021 - Packets Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters - 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of active relay sessions over UDP that are exceeding bandwidth limit.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10 active relay sessions over UDP are exceeding the bandwidth limit
More than 20 active relay sessions over UDP are exceeding the bandwidth limit

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 026 - Active Sessions Exceeding Avg Bandwidth Limit

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters - 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of active relay sessions over UDP that are exceeding bandwidth limit.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10 active relay sessions over UDP are exceeding the bandwidth limit
More than 20 active relay sessions over UDP are exceeding the bandwidth limit

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit
CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 00 - UDP Counters(_Total)\- 027 - Active Sessions Exceeding Peak Bandwidth Limit

ANALYSIS.NAME: A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters - 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec

CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 004 - Authentication Failures/sec

ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

More than 20 allocate requests over TCP exceeded the port limit per-second

CHART.DATASOURCE: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 006 - Allocate Requests Exceeding Port Limit/sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \A/V Edge - 01 - TCP Counters(_Total)\- 022 - Packets Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:API - 00 - API Application Instance Counters API - 026 - Transactions Pending Dispatch Completion
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:API - 00 - API Application Instance Counters(_Total)\API - 026 - Transactions Pending Dispatch Completion
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The current total number of active transactions awaiting Dispatch completion.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:API - 00 - API Application Instance Counters(_Total)\API - 026 - Transactions Pending Dispatch Completion
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:API - 00 - API Application Instance Counters(_Total)\API - 026 - Transactions Pending Dispatch Completion

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 1000 active transactions awaiting Dispatch completion

CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:API - 00 - API Application Instance Counters(_Total)\API - 026 - Transactions Pending Dispatch Completion

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 01 - Peers SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of established TLS connections that are currently active. TLS Connection is considered established when peer certificate and, possibly, host name are verified for trust relationship.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10000 established TLS connections are currently active

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 001 - TLS Connections Active

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 01 - Peers SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of connections that were dropped because the limit on number of incoming connections from a federated partner or clearinghouse was exceeded.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 1 connection was dropped because the limit on number of incoming connections from a federated partner or clearinghouse was exceeded

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 004 - Above Limit Connections Dropped (Access Proxies only)

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 01 - Peers SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of sends dropped because they stayed in the outgoing (send) queue for too long.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 1000 sends were dropped because they stayed in the outgoing (send) queue for too long

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 018 - Sends Timed-Out

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 01 - Peers SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of connections that are currently being flow-controlled (no socket receives are posted).

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 100 connections are currently being flow-controlled

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 023 - Flow-controlled Connections

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 01 - Peers SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of connections dropped because of excessive flow-control.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 10 connections were dropped because of excessive flow-control

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 01 - Peers(_Total)\SIP - 024 - Flow-controlled Connections Dropped

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of incoming requests dropped because they could not be processed (due to bad headers, insufficient routing information, server resource allocation failure).

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 1 request per-second was dropped because they could not be processed

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 005 - Incoming Requests Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of incoming responses dropped because they could not be processed (due to bad headers, insufficient routing information, server resource allocation failure).

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 1 response per-second was dropped because they could not be processed

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 009 - Incoming Responses Dropped/sec

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of messages dropped because the remote peer's certificate did not contain a matching FQDN.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 100 messages per-second were dropped because the remote peer's certificate did not contain a matching FQDN

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 011 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Certificate Mismatch

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol SIP - 012 - Messages In Server
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 012 - Messages In Server
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of messages currently being processed by the server.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 012 - Messages In Server
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 012 - Messages In Server

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 5000 messages are currently being processed by the server

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 012 - Messages In Server
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 012 - Messages In Server

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The average time (in seconds) it takes to process an incoming message.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time

THRESHOLD.NAME: It is taking more than 5 seconds (average) to process an incoming message

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 02 - Protocol\SIP - 021 - Average Incoming Message Processing Time

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management SIP - 009 - Address space usage
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management\SIP - 009 - Address space usage
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of available address space currently in use by the server process.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management\SIP - 009 - Address space usage
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management\SIP - 009 - Address space usage

THRESHOLD.NAME: More than 70 percent of the available address space is currently in use by the server process
More than 80 percent of the available address space is currently in use by the server process

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management\SIP - 009 - Address space usage
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 07 - Load Management\SIP - 009 - Address space usage

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 08 - Access Edge Server Connections SIP - 013 - Rejected External Edge Server Connections/sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 08 - Access Edge Server Connections\SIP - 013 - Rejected External Edge Server Connections/sec

CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 08 - Access Edge Server Connections\SIP - 013 - Rejected External Edge Server Connections/sec

ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 08 - Access Edge Server Connections\SIP - 015 - Rejected External Edge Client Connections/sec

DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 08 - Access Edge Server Connections\SIP - 015 - Rejected External Edge Client Connections/sec

ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 09 - Access Edge Server Messages\SIP - 021 - Messages/sec Dropped Due To Unknown Domain

ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 09 - Access Edge Server Messages\SIP - 027 - External Messages/sec Dropped Due To Blocked Domain
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of messages dropped at the external edge because the domain is in the blocked list.

DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:SIP - 09 - Access Edge Server Messages\SIP - 027 - External Messages/sec Dropped Due To Blocked Domain

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:SIP - 09 - Access Edge Server Messages SIP - 029 - Client Messages/sec Dropped Due To Unsupported Internal Domain
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:SIP - 09 - Access Edge Server Messages\SIP - 029 - Client Messages/sec Dropped Due To Unsupported Internal Domain
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The per-second rate of client messages dropped at the external edge because the domain is not internally supported.
